title: Connection Issue
body:
I get this 'connection error, please try again' issue. However, it only happens once for every match.

Everything is fine for the pick/ban phase but as soon as I get to the loading screen, I get the connection issue.

Funnily enough, I can reconnect after everybody is connected to the game.

It does not happen during the game though. Please help.

replies.body: Your connection could be unstable here, so you can never be too certain if you'll be able to reach our game server or not.  You should run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide in a custom game for now to help get this fixed up.
